WhoWeAre.subTitle: Who We Are
WhoWeAre.mainTitle: Simple, overdible, at facitle secret detailing products.
WhoWeAre.firstParagraph: Highline Car Care has been serving the automotive community in Riyadh, Saudi Arabia, for over four decades. Founded by the Al-Sulaimani family in 1977, our commitment to quality and customer satisfaction has remained unwavering throughout our journey.
WhoWeAre.secondParagraph: In 2018, we rebranded as Highline Car Care, reflecting our evolution into a modern, specialized car care service provider while maintaining our roots in traditional automotive expertise.
WhoWeAre.thirdParagraph: Our team of skilled professionals combines years of experience with cutting-edge techniques to deliver exceptional results for every vehicle that enters our facility.

secondBox.title: Specialized in premium and luxury cars protection and maintenance services

stepOneCol.title: Initial Consultation
stepOneCol.paragraph: We assess your vehicle's current condition and discuss your specific needs.

stepTwoCol.title: Service Selection
stepTwoCol.paragraph: Choose from our range of protection, polishing, spraying, and maintenance services.

stepThreeCol.title: Expert Application
stepThreeCol.paragraph: Our trained technicians apply the selected treatments using state-of-the-art equipment.

stepFourCol.title: Follow-up
stepFourCol.paragraph: We schedule a follow-up appointment to maintain your vehicle's optimal condition.
